SFDS Total Commander Plugin
Supports creating(including SFX)/extracting SFDS Files.

First compile:
"..\SFX win32\default_sfx.dpr" (You might want to compress the exe with UPX)

After that run:
"build sfx res.bat"

Finally compile the project:
"SFS_TC.dpr"

Final Step:
Register the "SFDS_TC.wcx" with Total Commander.
